input.sentences: we went to the new organization arena
there were plans for a new amphitheater
the old one has more history
it is an amazing place to visit
output.sentences: We were excited to go to the Arcosanti arena.
The amphitheater was architecturally incredible with intricate geometry.
The buildings looked futuristic and sleek.
It was amazing to the see how the amphitheater used to look and get a piece of the building's history.
With everything to see, it's worth another visit soon!
